`mirt` Vignette Files
=====================

The following contains a list of links to various HTML vignettes with the `mirt` package, 
generated using R markdown via the `knitr` package and hosted on Github.

# User Contributions

If you would like to contribute your own to the collection then feel free to send along your 
source file (`.Rmd`) and I'll add it to the appropriate package locations.
